title: CS Practical Competency Enhancement: Online Cultural Care Competency Development Program for Nursing Students

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can understand the health beliefs of patients from diverse cultural backgrounds and develop care plans based on cultural sensitivity
Learners can explain effective communication strategies considering cultural differences by applying them to real-world cases
Learners can analyze ethical dilemmas that may arise in multicultural environments and propose solutions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
